channel.title: Colorado Holidays on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Colorado Holidays on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: thanksgiving was a sham..
item.description: So I just got back.. well not just but recently got back from my parents house in colorful colorado and we had our fake thanksgiving. it was really nice. a bunch of people came and had fun with us. the best was watching kile and the crew play with the confetti poppers. I was able to see amy and wes’s new person as well as get the thumbs up from wes.
